targets.expr: max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"})

sum by (severity, alertname, componentId, componentName, componentClass, systemId, envId) (ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",systemId=~"[[systemId]]",severity="error"})

max(otcs_resource_disk_space_used{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}) by (systemId, mountpoint) / max(otcs_resource_disk_space_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"} and on(systemId) otcs_heartbeat_up{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}) by (systemId, mountpoint)

count(count by (envId, alertname, severity) (ALERTS{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="error"} or ALERTS{systemId=~"[[systemId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="error"})) * sum(otcs_resource_trace_files_total{systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}) or vector(0)

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system
list.label: System
list.name: systemId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system
